PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06172024-05-30CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of FRANÇOIS R. ROY of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Terrence Burgoyne, whose term will expire, effective June 1, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of FRANÇOIS R. ROY of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Terrence Burgoyne, whose term will expire, effective June 1, 2024.
